name: Kezar Sports Complex
description: Features: - Accessible Parking - Athletic Field - Available for Rentals - Parking - Restrooms - Stadium - Kezar Pavilion: A cast-in-place concrete gymnasium that seats 2,500 spectators for basketball, tennis, and other court games. The wood playing floor is sprung. For Rental/Permit INFO https://ca-sanfranciscorecandparks.civicplus.com/425/Stadium-Rentals.
